displayProperties.name: Medal Mania
displayProperties.description: Earn Vanguard Medals.

displayProperties.name: Worlds Championship Tour
displayProperties.description: Complete activities on Destinations such as Blind Well, Altars of Sorrow, Empire Hunts, Wellspring, Partition, and Terminal Overload.

displayProperties.name: Hall of Fame
displayProperties.description: Complete a Guardian Games Nightfall without dying. Also, complete a match of Supremacy with a score of at least 30.

displayProperties.name: Up for the Challenge
displayProperties.description: Complete Guardian Games Ops Nightfalls.

displayProperties.name: Masked Bandit
displayProperties.description: Complete Crucible or Gambit matches while wearing a Festival mask.

displayProperties.name: Heads Will Roll
displayProperties.description: Defeat Headless Ones in Haunted Sectors.

displayProperties.name: Run the Circuit
displayProperties.description: Complete Guardian Games playlist activities.

displayProperties.name: Silver Surfing
displayProperties.description: Earn a Silver score in a Guardian Games: Competitive playlist activity.

displayProperties.name: Mystery Meet
displayProperties.description: Purchase Epic Mystery Grab Bags from Eva.

displayProperties.name: Gambit Ritualist
displayProperties.description: Earn the Gambit ornament for the Chivalric Fire sword.

displayProperties.name: Gambit Contender
displayProperties.description: Finish 3 Gambit Contender Cards.

displayProperties.name: Grand Slam
displayProperties.description: Reach the Platinum score threshold in the Guardian Games Nightfall playlist.

displayProperties.name: Record Setter
displayProperties.description: Complete Platinum Contender Cards. Contender Cards can be purchased from Eva!

displayProperties.name: Take Your Place
displayProperties.description: Attend the Closing Ceremony.

displayProperties.name: Crucible Contender
displayProperties.description: Finish 3 Crucible Contender Cards.

displayProperties.name: Class Pride
displayProperties.description: Complete Supremacy or Guardian Games playlist activities with Class Matchmaking enabled, or participate in Focus Activities.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Ritualist
displayProperties.description: Earn the Vanguard Ops ornament for the Chivalric Fire sword.

displayProperties.name: The Bronze Effect
displayProperties.description: Earn a Bronze score in a Guardian Games: Competitive playlist activity.

displayProperties.name: Elements of Victory
displayProperties.description: Defeat enemies with elemental abilities or weapons.

displayProperties.name: The Gold Standard
displayProperties.description: Earn a Gold score in a Guardian Games: Competitive playlist activity.

displayProperties.name: Friendly Rivalry
displayProperties.description: Complete Crucible, Gambit, or Supremacy matches.

displayProperties.name: Crest Collector
displayProperties.description: Earn points in Supremacy by picking up crests from defeated opponents.

displayProperties.name: In It to Win It
displayProperties.description: Earn a Medallion from activity completions, and bank it at the podium in the Tower for rewards and class points!

displayProperties.name: In the Cards
displayProperties.description: Complete Contender and Platinum Cards, which can be obtained from Eva.

displayProperties.name: Crucible Ritualist
displayProperties.description: Earn the Crucible ornament for the Chivalric Fire sword.

displayProperties.name: Bronze
displayProperties.description: Bank Medallions at the podium in the Tower to contribute points towards your class standing! Higher-ranked Medallions contribute more points.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Contender
displayProperties.description: Complete 3 Vanguard playlist Contender Cards.

displayProperties.name: Good Games
displayProperties.description: Defeat targets in Supremacy matches or Guardian Games playlists.

displayProperties.name: Going the Distance
displayProperties.description: Bank Medallions at the podium in the Tower to contribute points towards your class standing! Higher-ranked Medallions grant more points.

displayProperties.name: Seasonal Contender

displayProperties.description: Complete Dares of Eternity, Vanguard Ops playlist activities, or Seasonal activities.

displayProperties.name: Champ
displayProperties.description: Complete all Event Card challenges during Guardian Games. Progress resets at the end of the event.
